pages.text: $(l)Light of the First Moon, Year 2157$()$(br2)Close call earlier. Too close. If it hadn't been for my silver tongue, the patrol would have ratted us out for sure. Damned goons wanted a manifest. Oh, really? Well, I gave it to them alright! Told them I had a delivery for that so-called Governor up in his pompous flying tower. Is he compensating or what?

Very important, I said. His personal collection of calabash marrowood pipes. And it was already running late. I want to see it, he said. Is that so? Governor won't be happy to know some grass-eating simpleton so much as looked at them, let alone inspected them. Shut him right up. Waved us along with an, “Off you go, then.”$(br2)Typical Imperial halfwit.
